page.title: 17PADSTOW SCOUT TROOP
page.content: Padstow Scout Troop has just been reformed this year after an absence of 10 years.We meet on Tuesdays between 7 and 9 and it costs 30p a week.At the moment there are only enough boys to have two patrols, Kingfisher and Beaver,I am in Kingfisher. Recently we have been learning how to build camp fires{and we are only {allowed to use one match each!}Once we have got our fires going we have barbecues on them.We have built{aerial {runways}and the first time we used them one of our gang crashed into a tree - luckily not hurting himself. Some of the boys have been going across to Par beach to learn how to canoe,but you have to be a good swimmer first before you are allowed in the canoes.We go camping with other troops in the District and we hope to have our own camp later in the summer.
